name: Logitech Z320 10 W Speakers
Features: [360-degree sound: Also known as omnidirectional acoustics, 360-degree sound helps project sound evenly in all directions, giving you a great listening experience throughout the room., 10 watts (RMS) of power: Turn up the volume on music, videos, and games., Stand-alone system: Enjoy a full range of sound in a small package, without bulky add-ons. Perfect for notebook computers.]
